main.bio: Hello, I’m a UI/UX Designer & Full Stack Developer from Tamil Nadu, India. I hold a bachelor's degree of Computer Science from the Anna University.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to receive further details, get coached or anything else.

testimonials.text: Prashanth is a highly enthusiastic engineer who can quickly learn new technologies. He has a huge potential to build great products from scratch. He respectfully challenge decisions and insist on high standards. Overall he’s a great team player and an assertive go-getter.
Prashanth has always been very innovative and up to date in the technological front. In simple words “He is fast, he is precise and he is to the point”. Always a perfect outcome.
